name: Lab Run (mikeklubnika, martin293)
description:
Congratulations! You are an intern in the underground E.K.R.E Science Facility and you have just created a 20,000 gigaton mixture! All you have to do now is get it to your supervisors. Just make sure you don't bump into anyone, your mixture isn't exactly stable.

This game was made in under 72 hours for the Ludum Dare 49 Game Jam.

Controls:

- WASD to move

- MOUSE to look around

- F to toggle music on/off
